item.title: Set up scheduled SMART tests on Proxmox and send alerts via push notifications to your mobile phone
item.description: Intro My Synology NAS sends weekly (quick tests) and monthly (extended tests) health reports of its hard drives to my email. I wanted to add this functionality to my Proxmox server to keep an eye on my drives. After some trial and error, I successfully achieved this functionality. Now, I receive these notifications on my phone with the help of ntfy.sh. Here are the steps I took to make it work.
